entry.title: FirstWeekLaravel
entry.content:
摸鱼踩坑

第一周笔记

目录


app:核心代码。包含了站点的controllers（控制器），models（模型），views（视图）和assets（资源）。
bootstrap：框架启动自动加载配置
config：所有应用程序配置
database：数据库迁移与填充文件
public：入口和项目文件。这个文件夹是唯一外界可以看到的，必须指向web服务器的目录。它含有laravel框架核心的引导文件index.php，这个目录也可用来存放任何可以公开的静态资源，如css，Javascript，images等。
resources：视图和原始的资源文件，其中的views就是MVC中的V层。
storage：编译后的模板文件以及基于文件的session文件缓存、日志和其他框架产生的缓存
tests：单元测试文件
vendor：用来存放所有的第三方代码，在一个典型的Laravel应用程序，这包括Laravel源代码及其相关，并含有额外的预包装功能的插件。
Laravel 的文件夹结构

路由

基本路由

实现了下基本路由，Laravel框架下的第一个Hello world！
routes/web.php

路由方法

多请求路由

路由参数

在路由中捕获一些URL片段。参数通常都会被放在{}内，参数名只能为字母，同时路由参数不能包含-，如果需要可以用下划线 _代替。路由参数会按顺序依次被注入到路由回调或者控制器中，而不受回调或者控制器的参数名称的影响。

必填参数

单个参数


多个参数

可选参数

指定一个路由参数，这个参数是可选的。在参数后面加上?来实现,但前提确保路由的相应变量有默认值

正则表达式约束

路由别名

路由群组

Laravel HTTP 路由功能

####

entry.title: 微信测试账号自定义菜单/自动回复
entry.content:
各种踩坑后勉勉强强有个雏形

服务器基本配置

阿里云服务器安装完apache通过IP访问无反应，然后发现?阿里云服务器需要在安全组选项配置一下外部可访问端口，比如apache默认使用的端口是80，需要在安全组添加安全组规则。
参考
然而最后选择SAE的我

验证Token

按照接入指南来
检验signature对请求进行校验。若确认此次GET请求来自微信服务器，请原样返回echostr参数内容，则接入生效，成为开发者成功，否则接入失败。
流程如下：
1.将token、timestamp、nonce三个参数进行字典序排序
2.将三个参数字符串拼接成一个字符串进行sha1加密
3.开获得加密后的字符串可与signature对比

自定义菜单

表单样式

参数

button:必须，一级菜单
sub_button:二级菜单
type:响应动作类型(view/click/miniprogram)
name:菜单标题
view类型必须url:链接跳转

创建自定义菜单

接口调用
http请求方式:POST(使用https协议)https://api.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/menu/create?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN
PHP参考

消息自动回复

emmmm只有文本消息回复

entry.title: 离散笔记
entry.content:
离散离散

4.2 群与子群

群

定义

4.3 循环群与置换群

循环群

定义

设$<G,*>$是一个群，若在$G$上存在元素$a$，使得$G$中的任何元素都由$a$的幂构成，该群为循环群。$a$为生成元。
$G= \lbrace{a^k \mid k \in Z}\rbrace$，记作$G=< a >$。

定理

一个群的生成元可能不唯一。
任何一个循环群必是阿贝尔群。

阿贝尔群(交换群)：满足交换律。(关于主对角线对称判断)

循环群中生成元的阶数与群的阶数相同。
设$<G,\ast>$是由元素$a$生成的$n$阶有限循环群，
即$\lvert G\rvert=n$,则$a^n=e$,且$G=\lbrace{a,a^2,a^3,\cdots,a^{n-1},a^n=e}\rbrace$ (P64定理4.14)

群的阶数：群中元素的个数。(P49定义4.5)
元素的阶数：设$<G,\circ>$是一个群，使得$x^k=e$成立的最小正整数$k$，记为$\lvert x\rvert$，即为元素的阶数。(P60顶部)

循环群的子群仍是循环群。
无限阶循环群的子群除$< e >$外，仍为无限阶循环群。
$n$阶循环群$G=< a >$的子群的阶数均为$n$的因子。对于$n$的每个正因子$d$，有且只有一个$d$阶循环子群，生成元为$a^{n \over d}$
无限阶循环群：生成元为$a$,$a^{-1}$
$n$阶循环群：生成元为$a^t$,当且仅当$t$与$n$互质

置换群

$n$元置换可用不交的轮换之积表示
恒等置换表示为$(1)$
逆置换:上下两行互换。
定义:$S_n$关于置换的复合$\ast$ 构成的群$<S_n,\ast>$,称为$S$上的$n$元对称群，它的任何子群称为$S$上的$n$元置换群。
定理:任一有限群均与一个置换群同构。

4.4 陪集与拉格朗日定理

陪集

定义
设$<G, \ast >$是一个有限群,$<H, \ast >$是其子群,且$H=\lbrace{h_1,h_2,\cdots , h_n }\rbrace$,对于$G$中任意元素$g$,集合$\lbrace{g \ast h_1,g \ast h_2,\cdots,g \ast h_n}\rbrace(\lbrace{h_1 \ast g,h_2 \ast g,\cdots,h_n \ast g}\rbrace)$称为$g$关于子群$<H,\ast>$的左(右)陪集,记作$g\ast H(H\ast g)$。
左右陪集相等，则称其为关于子群$<H,\ast>$的陪集。
引理1
设$<G, \ast >$是一个有限群,$<H, \ast >$是其子群,$\forall h_i \in H$,则$$h_i \ast H=H \ast h_i=H$$
引理2
设$<G, \ast >$是一个有限群,$<H, \ast >$是其子群,对于$a\in G$和$h \in H$,有$$(a \ast h)\ast H=a \ast H$$
引理3
设$<G, \ast >$是一个有限群,$<H, \ast >$是其子群,$a,b \in G$,则$a \ast H$和$b \ast H$或者相等，或者互不相交。

拉格朗日定理

拉格朗日定理
设$<G, \ast >$是一个有限群,$<H, \ast >$是其子群,若$\lvert G\rvert=m$,$\lvert H\rvert=n$,则$n$能整除$m$。
推论1

entry.title: 高数笔记
entry.content:
高数高数

9-5 隐函数的求导公式

隐函数存在定理

$$
F(x,y)在点P(x_0,y_0)某一邻域有连续偏导数，F(x_0,y_0)=0,F_y(x_0,y_0)≠0(分母不为0)
$$
$$
\frac{dy}{dx}
= -\frac{F_x}{F_y}
$$

二阶导数

隐函数求导方法

1.复合函数求导 2.全微分形式不变性 3. 公式代入

全微分方法

$dz=(1)dx+(2)dy$ $\to$ $(1)=\frac{\partial z}{\partial x}$ $(2)=\frac{\partial z}{\partial y}$

例1

设$z=f(x+y+z,xyz)$,求$\frac{\partial z}{\partial x},\frac{\partial x}{\partial z},\frac{\partial x}{\partial y}$
$dz=f_{1}^{\prime}d(x+y+z)+f_{2}^{\prime}d(xyz)$
$dz=f_{1}^{\prime}dx+f_{1}^{\prime}dy+f_{1}^{\prime}dz+f_{2}^{\prime}yzdx+f_{2}^{\prime}xydz+f_{2}^{\prime}xzdy$
整理方程

例2

若$z=z(x,y)$由$e^{x+y+3z}+xyz=1$确定,求$dz\mid _{(0,0)}$
$x,y$代入解得$z=0$
全微分整理得$dz\mid _{(0,0)}=-\frac{1}{3}dx-\frac{1}{3}dy$

例3

$设f(u,v)可微,由(x+1)z-y^2=s^2f(x-z,y)确定,求dz\mid_{(0,1)}$
解得 $z=1$
$dz\mid_{(0,1)}=-dx+2ydy$

例4

$函数z=z(x,y)由方程\ln z+e^{z-1}=xy确定,求\frac{\partial z}{\partial x}\mid _{(2,\frac{1}{2})}$
解得$z=1,\frac{\partial z}{\partial x}\mid _{(2,\frac{1}{2})}=\frac{1}{4}$

$$\frac{\partial u}{\partial t}
= h^2 \left( \frac{\partial^2 u}{\partial x^2} +
\frac{\partial^2 u}{\partial y^2} +
\frac{\partial^2 u}{\partial z^2}\right)$$

entry.title: 背单词日常
entry.content:
CET6

show remarkable endurance 非凡的忍耐力
adopt drastic measures 采取激烈的手段
be both physically and mentally mature
foul water
elect a delegate to the conference
environmental destruction
make a fuss 大惊小怪
a commonplace occurrence 司空见惯的事情
She advanced to the table.
drain the water from the sink
be entitled to an allowance
annual salary
widely prevalent
market orientation 市场导向
provoke up an armed conflict 挑起武装冲突
authentic Sichuan food
have an exqusite taste in
carry out technical innovations
play a predominat part in
apply for a patant
engage in a warfare
thermal springs 温泉
feel great anxiety about future

2018.4.7

quarterly

at the quarterly conference
a quarterly journal

brood

沉思 孵蛋 一窝

specimen

可数，注意是e

boycott

press a boycott on sth 敦促抵制某物
boycott sth

answer

the answer to question

atom

smash the plate to atoms
There isn’t an atom of truth in it. 这毫无真实性

atom/atmosphere

sympathize

sympathize with sb/sth

entitle

be entitled to sth

anxiety

feel anxiety about sth
anxiety for sth
anxiety to do sth

activity

活动，行动；活跃，活力

a classroom full of activity
work with activity

admission

admission of sth 承认

approve

批准，认可 approve sth
赞成 approve of sth

2018.4.9

He is accustomed to shoving heavy load onto others.
A journalist exposes a scandal.
Some parents usually impose their idea on their children.
This kind of fruit meets with widespread acceptance.
The place is famous for its thermal springs.
It’s actually an important episode in my life.
That episode was still so vivid to me.
In China people usually sell their houses through an agency.
It’s amazing that the constitution is amended this year.
You’d better amend your manners.
The news fills me with alarm.
I have to acknowledge that I am inferior to others in many aspects.
You can not image the life of people who are inferior in social position.
His representation of a storm at sea was so vivid as if he had experienced it.
Bob flies into a fury even though others advised hiim to restrain his fury.
A Bite of China embodies the essence of the Chinese food.
Paper making originates in China.
Theories originate from practice.
Teachers should supervise students’ examinations.
Maybe he will have a beer belly in the future.
Trump has a tendenct to provoke up an conflict.
The government should acquaint the public with the law.
People who violate the constitution will be punished.
People erect monuments in memory of revolutionary martyrs.
He needs a especial condition to brood.
You are entitled to assert yourself.
I advocate a policy of gradual reform.
His dream was shattered.
I saw the color drain from her face.
The country face fiscal crisis.
I have to constrain my consumption.

2018.4.10

She will record her speech on a tape.
Do you have a tap recorder?
Hearing the bell ring,she opens the door a crack.
We measures the length with a ruler.
I have a ambitious plan.
I don’t know how to mount a horse.
Can you mount that ladder and pass on me the plate?
She is the dominant child in the group.
You should not stand on a dominant cliff.
The dominant culture inhibits obscence culture.
The sunlight pierces the heavy mist.
The tides advance;the tides recede.
People usually give a bias to boy.
The guilt pierces his heart.
He is overwhelmed by guilt.
Eyes blurred with tears.

2018.4.17

These pictures depict the change of employment market. University graduates are not in great demand, but the number of them is still on the increase. We are supposed to the idea that it’s the education popularized in the whole society that contributes to the change.

The change has brought about some adverse effects. First, people with diploma have more trouble in finding a well-paid jod, which makes them under great stress of life. Besides, the phenomenon may result in the situation that more people give up further study and choose to work earlier. What’s more, people with higher education will gather at particular places, making the differentiation of places more obvious.

So what should be done to meet the change?
